EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Your Order - {!Order_Communication_POE__c.order_number__c} - Has Now Been Cancelled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
.
Dear {!Order_Communication_POE__c.ordexp_Purchaser_First_Name__c},
Our Team has made several attempts to contact you regarding your recent booking. As you haven't supplied your completed Passenger Information Form to us, please be advised that your booking is now cancelled, in line with our Terms and Conditions.
You have now been issued with a TripADeal credit voucher for the value of your booking.
YOUR COUPON DETAILS:
COUPON CODE: {!Order_Communication_POE__c.TAD_Coupon_Name__c}
COUPON VALUE: ${!Order_Communication_POE__c.Coupon_Total__c}
COUPON EXPIRY: {!TODAY() + 365}
We're here to help you. If you have any questions, please visit our Support Page. Or call us on 1300 861 736.
Regards, The TripADeal Team
.
